prod_desc: Engage the Rebels with the tough TIE Striker Microfighter!
prod_long_desc:
Join the battle with this TIE Striker Microfighter, featuring folding wings, two stud shooters and space to seat the included TIE Pilot with his blaster pistol.
Includes TIE Pilot minifigure.
Features folding wings, two stud shooters and an open cockpit with space for a minifigure to sit.
Fold the wings up and fire the stud shooters to engage the enemy.
Also includes TIE Pilot’s blaster pistol.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 6-12.
Recreate exciting battle scenes from the blockbuster movie Star Wars: Rogue One.
Makes a great addition to any microfighter collectible set.
Measures over 1” high, 3” long and 3” wide.
